sqlMap.statement:
SELECT B.RTE_NUM , B.SHPG_PLN_NUM , B.SCE_ORD_TP_CD FROM RTE_GRP A , RTE_GRP_DTL B , SHPG_PLN C
, SCE_ORD_TP D
WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = B.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND A.RTE_GRP_NUM = B.RTE_GRP_NUM AND B.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND B.SHPG_PLN_NUM = C.SHPG_PLN_NUM
AND B.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND B.SCE_ORD_TP_CD = D.SCE_ORD_TP_CD
AND A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.RTE_STS_CD = #rteStsCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND B.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.SHPG_STS_CD = #shpgStsCd# AND C.RTE_STS_CD = #rteStsCd# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND D.INBD_OTBD_CD = '2' AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
ORDER BY
D.SCE_ORD_TP_SORT_NUM
, B.RTE_NUM , B.SHPG_PLN_NUM
